New Records: Luka Dončić scored 32 points, nine rebounds, and seven assists in the Mavericks' 108-85 win over the Magic, setting up their largest victory margin of the season. Dončić also reached a milestone by scoring 25+ points in the first half of 30+ games, with the Mavericks winning 22 of those
Key Match Events: Luka Dončić's strong first-half performance, including 14 points, five rebounds, and three assists in the opening frame, led to a blowout victory over the Magic
Pre-Game Insights: Luka Dončić acknowledged his slow start in the previous game but responded with a strong performance, showcasing his determination and focus
Post-Match Reflections: The Mavericks' coach and players praised Dončić's leadership and effort, highlighting the team's dominance and Dončić's key role in the win
